title: Zimbabwe’s central bank to introduce new currency circulate alongside bond notes and coins
text:
Zimbabwe’s central bank to introduce new currency circulate alongside bond notes and coins

Forex 1 hour ago (Oct 29, 2019 14:54)

© Reuters. Zimbabwe’s central bank to introduce new currency circulate alongside bond notes and coins HARARE, Oct 29 (Reuters) - Zimbabwe's central bank will introduce a new currency in the next two weeks, which will circulate alongside the bond notes and coins, the latest step towards restoring a domestic currency, the central bank governor said on Tuesday. John Mangudya said the new currency would consist of 5 dollar notes and 2 dollar coins and would be introduced gradually to prevent driving up inflation.

Zimbabwe’s central bank to introduce new currency circulate alongside bond notes and coins
description: Zimbabwe’s central bank to introduce new currency circulate alongside bond notes and coins
